title: Kensaku to Enjin no Atarashii Tomodachi: Query Toujou!
original_name: けんさくとえんじんの新しいともだち クエリ登場！
sinopse: Yahoo!'s Kensaku to Enjin franchise gained a new character: Query. She wants to be an idol, loves fashion, and gets quite the motor mouth when angry. This short 2D animation debuts her on stage.
